tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview:
0:39
Go away! I'm trying to sleep damn you.﻿
Omg i wanna lay﻿ beside them and rub their bellies=D
Are﻿ these dogs bred for their fur? lovely coats they ahve. :)

PLEASE CHIP IN:
We have 4 precious babies fighting for﻿ their lives with Parvo. They﻿ are getting wonderful medical care, but their vet bills are going to exceed﻿ $2000, money we don't have. While everyone enjoys looking at photos of cute puppies,﻿ this is the sad reality of rescue & Cuddly Canines cannot continue to survive without donations. Please help us help these babies by clicking on the ChipIn link & donating to their care.
h t t p : / / w w w﻿ .cuddlycanines. c o m /
[No spaces]
可愛いですね(^^) もふりたいです♪﻿
これはイカン、これはタマラン。この動画は反則ですゾ(笑)﻿
犬みたいな子どもだなぁ﻿
よっぽどおねむなんですね〜かわいい〜〜vv﻿
corgiとても可愛くて好きです。あなたのビデオは非常に貴重な！私は韓国人だが、翻訳を介して日本語で書いている。あなたのビデオ中にひまわり撮られたもの見た日本のどの地域ですか？﻿

Reviewer.Books: Horror boigraphys evrything paranormal Dean R Koontz,Stephen King, OFC Joyce Carol Oates amongs others
Reviewer.Music: Evry thing from pop darkwave m pop but i like a lot of rock,hardcore,synth,rockabilly,dubstep,trance and also some classic music it depends in which moodstate im in

Reviewer.Books: I also like to read books.... but it's hard for me to find something i can get into. my favorite book would have to be "A Samurai's Tale". I would also say Manga but i don't think that would count. plus i haven't really been reading too much manga lately.
Reviewer.Movies: I love going oot to the movies with friends. the best one i've seen in a while would be the Boodock Saints. Im usually more into commedies i like to laugh. I'm Not as into tv as i was before. i just watch some vh1, tbs, and commedy central every now and then, but i do still make time for anime on adult swim ^_^ lol can you blame me?
Reviewer.Music: I have a very high music tolerance. I can pretty much listen to anything that sounds good to me. I mostly Listen to rock (all type, including metal), Hip-hop, J-music in general, and yeah some pinoy music.

Reviewer.Movies: FootLoose; Brother Bear 1 and 2; Shrek movies; Heart Break Ridge; and many others.
Reviewer.School: I graduated at the top 10 of my class in highschool. I'm about to start college soon I can't wait.
